channel.title: Mute command
channel.description: can someone give me a working mute command and unmute command?

item.title: Mute command
item.dc:creator: @duffy12345678910 duffy12345678910
item.description:
@duffy12345678910 wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:2, topic:332118”][code=java]
if (command.startsWith(“mute”) && playerRights >= 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
		if(p.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("pure str pk")) {
		sM("you can't mute pure str pk!");
		}

                    p.muted = true;
		writeLog(p.playerName, "mutes");
		sM("You have muted "+p.playerName+"!");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to mute..");
            }
        }

[/code]

note: this only works if you even have a mute file, for unmute though idk :[/quote]
would be good if i got a non delta

Read full topic

item.title: Mute command
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

            if (command.startsWith("mute") && playerRights >= 1) {
                try {
                    String otherPName = command.substring(5);
                    int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                    if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                        client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
			if(p.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("pure str pk")) {
			sM("you can't mute pure str pk!");
			}

                        p.muted = true;
			writeLog(p.playerName, "mutes");
			sM("You have muted "+p.playerName+"!");
                    } else { 
                       sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                    }
                } catch (Exception e) { 
                    sM("Try entering a name you want to mute..");
                }
            }

note: this only works if you even have a mute file, for unmute though idk :\
